overview: It's not a box. It's a house. A house where, for the right money, you can fuck yourself into stammering stupor. A magical place where Lily (Johnni) brings dolls to life before your eyes with the sole purpose of catering to the most intimate and outrageous desires your twisted libido can come up with. Go ahead and give 'em all you've got.
tagline: Imagine Xandu, Camelot, Stonehenge and Oz all put together...cool, huh?
title: Pandora
